mapper.select: select distinct oseq, otitle, lcnt, mid, oregdate, oview, gtitle from duoffer where odel ='n' order by oseq desc
select d.dseq, nvl(d.dname, '없음') dname, nvl(do.oseq,0) oseq from duty d left outer join (select oseq, dseq, dname from duoffer where oseq=#{oseq})do on d.dseq=do.dseq order by d.dseq
select o.oseq, d.dseq, nvl(d.dname, '없음') dname from offer o, duty d, dutyoffer do where o.oseq = do.oseq and do.dseq = d.dseq and o.odel='n' and o.oseq=#{oseq} and o.odel='n'

select o.mseq, o.mid, o.mname, o.oseq, o.gseq, o.otitle, o.obody, o.oregdate, o.oview, o.lcnt, m.mgender, g.gtitle, o.msi1, o.msgg1, o.memd1, o.msi2, o.msgg2, o.memd2, do.dseq, nvl(d.dname, '없음') dname from offerlcnt o, duty d, dutyoffer do, member m, gongmo g where o.oseq = do.oseq and d.dseq = do.dseq and m.mseq = o.mseq and o.gseq = g.gseq and o.oseq=#{oseq} order by oseq desc
select count(*) cnt from offer where odel='n'
